member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC
member.summary:
Nintendo File Archive used in WII/GC Games.
NOTE: THIS IS NOT A U8 ARCHIVE!

member.name: P:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.KeepFileIDsSynced
member.summary: If false, the user must set all unique ID's for each file

member.name: P:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.NextFreeFileID
member.summary: Gets the next free File ID

member.name: M:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.#ctor
member.summary: Create an empty archive

member.name: M:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.StringToHash(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a 2 byte hash from a string

member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.Directory
member.summary: Folder contained inside the Archive. Can contain more s if desired, as well as s

member.name: M:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.Directory.#ctor(Hack.io.RARC.RARC,Hack.io.RARC.RARC.Directory)
member.summary: Create a new, child directory
member.param: The Parent Directory. NULL if this is the Root Directory

member.name: M:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.Directory.CreateFromFolder(System.String,Hack.io.Class.Archive)
member.summary: Create an ArchiveDirectory. You cannot use this function unless this directory is empty

member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.File
member.summary: File contained inside the Archive

member.name: P:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.File.FileSettings
member.summary:
Extra settings for this File.
Default: |

member.name: P:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.File.ID
member.summary: The ID of the file in the archive

member.name: M:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.File.#ctor
member.summary: Empty file

member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.RARCDirEntry
member.summary: Only used when Reading / Writing

member.name: P:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.RARCDirEntry.Type
member.summary: Directory Type. usually the first 4 letters of the . If the is shorter than 4, the missing spots will be ' ' (space)

member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.RARCFileEntry
member.summary: Only used when Reading / Writing

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.RARCFileEntry.ModularA
member.summary: For files: offset to file data in file data section, for subdirectories: index of the corresponding directory node

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.RARCFileEntry.ModularB
member.summary: For files: size of the file, for subdirectories: always 0x10 (size of the node entry?)

member.name: T:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute
member.summary: File Attibutes for

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.FILE
member.summary: Indicates this is a File

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.DIRECTORY
member.summary: Directory. Not allowed to be used for s, only here for reference

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.COMPRESSED
member.summary: Indicates that this file is compressed

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.PRELOAD_TO_MRAM
member.summary: Indicates that this file gets Pre-loaded into Main RAM

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.PRELOAD_TO_ARAM
member.summary: Indicates that this file gets Pre-loaded into Auxiliary RAM

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.LOAD_FROM_DVD
member.summary: Indicates that this file does not get pre-loaded, but rather read from the DVD

member.name: F:Hack.io.RARC.RARC.FileAttribute.YAZ0_COMPRESSED
member.summary: Indicates that this file is YAZ0 Compressed
